unnormalised: OMG! You guys will NOT believe what I just heard! Bollywood is buzzing like a Bandra rickshaw stand after a 9 to 5 shift.
normalised: Oh My G! You guys will not believe what I just heard! Bollywood is buzzing like a Bandra rickshaw stand after a nine to five shift.

unnormalised: First up, rumors are swirling that Alia Bhatt might be pregnant AGAIN! Can you imagine? Two little superstars running around the Kapoor household? The paps are camped outside their Juhu bungalow 24/7 trying to get that bump shot. Apparently, sources say she's been craving nothing but spicy pani puri and Rajma Chawal, which, honestly, sounds amazing.

unnormalised: Then there’s the whole mess with Ranveer Singh. He was spotted leaving a fancy Mumbai restaurant with…wait for it… Deepika Padukone's COUSIN! Dun dun DUNNNN! Is there trouble in paradise? Or is it just a friendly family dinner? The internet is already exploding with memes and conspiracy theories. Someone even photoshopped Ranveer's face onto that infamous cheating boyfriend meme from "Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham!" Savage!

unnormalised: And speaking of savage, remember that awkward dance-off between Urvashi Rautela and Nora Fatehi at the Filmfare Awards last year? Well, apparently, the rivalry is STILL going strong! Sources close to the situation (aka my best friend's cousin who works at a Bollywood PR firm) says they were strategically placed on opposite ends of the Isha Ambani pre-wedding festivities in Jamnagar. Talk about avoiding drama!

unnormalised: Lastly, word on the street is that Kartik Aaryan is getting serious with his rumored girlfriend. They were spotted doing a midnight drive down Marine Drive in a fancy red car. No official confirmation yet, but my sources are saying they might be making their relationship official at the IIFA Awards in Abu Dhabi next month. Keep your eyes peeled, folks! This is a developing story!
